original_text: We took their land and gave it for an inheritance to the Reubenites, the Gadites, and the half-tribe of the Manassites.
korean_text: 그 땅을 차지하여 르우벤과 갓과 므낫세 반 지파에게 기업으로 주었나니

sentences.original_text: and gave it for an inheritance
to the Reubenites, the Gadites, and the half-tribe of the Manassites.
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤 사람들과, 갓 사람들, 그리고 므낫세 반 지파에게.
